t: Watch Leon | Prime Video
s: Leon is a character who lives in his own universe, constantly on the lookout for fun. His fearless, never-say-die personality and his penchant to try just about anything will often land him in trouble. But, never fear, Leon will always end up okay. In his world, the laws of physics barely apply.

t: Leon & Noel® Watches | Tell With Time
s: Leon & Noel is a small designer of watches located in Copenhagen, Denmark. Our name Leon & Noel is a palindrome - it reads the same backwards and forwards. For us, the name symbolises the harmony in watch designs.

Our story – Leon & Noel® Watches | Tell With Time
s: Truth be told, we know our story sounds similar to all other smaller designer watch brands. Located in Scandinavia, check. Swiss movement, check. Minimalistic design, check. 10 years in the making, surprisingly, check. High quality for the price, double check.
